title: AI clouds up the economic dashboard
description: The return of U.S. economic data when Washington reopens may do little to clear up a macro picture that is clouded by the dash for artificial intelligence and compounded by trade distortions.
content:
LONDON, Nov 10 (Reuters) - The return of U.S. economic data when Washington reopens may do little to clear up a macro picture that is clouded by the dash for artificial intelligence and compounded by trade distortions.

title: Halper AI Launches to Transform the Future of SMEs From Digital Souls to Business Growth
description: SAN FRANCISCO, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Artificial intelligence is transforming industries worldwide. But for small and medium sized businesses (SMBs), the real challenge isn’t access to technology; it’s access to time. Today, Halper AI, founded by Eduard Gevorkyan, launches to address exactly that challenge, giving business owners back the hours they need to grow and thrive.
content: SAN FRANCISCO, Nov. 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Artificial intelligence is transforming industries worldwide. But for small and medium sized businesses (SMBs), the real challenge isn’t access to technology; it’s access to time. Today, Halper AI, fou... [4033 chars]

title: AI use by mid-size construction firms boosts productivity by 20pc - while rest of industry falls behind, survey finds
description: Mid-size construction firms that adopted artificial intelligence early on have achieved productivity increases of 20pc, according to an AI training firm.
content:
The AI in the Built Environment report by the AI Institute – a Dublin-based company providing advice and training in all areas of AI – surveyed 29 senior representatives of firms in construction, engineering and architecture.

title: Rumble to acquire German AI firm Northern Data for about $767 million
description:
Rumble is set to acquire German artificial intelligence cloud company Northern Data in an all-stock transaction worth $766.86 million, the companies said on Monday.

content:
(Reuters) -Video platform Rumble is set to acquire German artificial intelligence cloud company Northern Data in an all-stock transaction worth $766.86 million, the companies said on Monday.

title: Rumble Eyes Acquisition of German AI Firm Northern Data
description: Video platform Rumble has announced its intentions to acquire the German AI cloud company, Northern Data. The move aims to bolster Rumble's technological capabilities and expand its influence in the AI sector. This potential acquisition highlights the growing intersection between media platforms and artificial intelligence.
content:
Video streaming platform Rumble has officially expressed interest in acquiring the German AI cloud company, Northern Data. The announcement was made by Northern Data on Monday.
This strategic move by Rumble is seen as a game-changer, potentially enha... [263 chars]

title: Asian shares advance as tech shares rebound from AI jitters
description: Asian shares advanced on Monday, lifted by technology shares as they rebounded from last week's jitters over the run up in stocks related to artificial intelligence.
content:
BANGKOK — Asian shares advanced on Monday, lifted by technology shares as they rebounded from last week's jitters over the run up in stocks related to artificial intelligence.

title: Two Oxford AI experts awarded prestigious fellowships
description: Two Oxford academics are among 28 global researchers awarded prestigious fellowships to shape the future of artificial intelligence
content:
Professor Philip Torr and Dr Christian Schroeder de Witt, both from Oxford University’s Department of Engineering Science, have been named AI2050 Research Fellows by Schmidt Sciences.

title: China stocks flat as consumer staples, liquor gains counter tech losses
description: ** Weighing on broader markets on Monday, the artificial intelligence sector index slid nearly 3% to a more than two-week low and the chip sector index weakened 1.3% as a correction for global tech shares continued over valuation concerns. ** The U.S. Senate moved forward with a measure aimed at reopening the federal government and ending a 40-day shutdown that has caused an unprecedented economic data blackout.
content:
China stocks struggled for direction on Monday as gains in defensive sectors including liquor and consumer staples on rising consumer prices countered losses in tech shares.
** At the midday break, the Shanghai Composite index was down 0.03% at 3,996... [1824 chars]

title: The AI revolution has a power problem
description: Echoing the 1990s dotcom frenzy to build Internet infrastructure, today's tech giants are spending unprecedented sums to construct the silicon backbone of the revolution in artificial intelligence.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO: In the race for AI dominance, American tech giants have the money and the chips, but their ambitions have hit a new obstacle: electric power.
